Works pretty well for me as well (except for some crashes but those might be caused by something else anyway). Thanks for the upload!

When I click on "Data Files" from the start launcher, a new, separate window called "Skyrim Data Files" opens up. Even though I directed the install path to my Skyrim folder and got the message that the installation was successful, there is still nothing in my "Skyrim Data Files" window. Did anyone else get stuck here?

I figured it out. When I installed into 'The Elder Scrolls Skyrim' folder it created a separate subfolder inside named "Skyrim Dawnguard DLC +Update v1.7706-=AviaRa=-" which the Skyrim Launcher's "Data Files" didn't recognize or load. I simply copied/moved all contents in this subfolder into the main 'Elder Scrolls' folder and it worked fine. You have mounted attacks now which is fierce, and I talked to a guard and got the Dawnguard quest line. Thank you very much for this. Much appreciated.
Worked perfect for me... I followed the steps to a "T" and the first guard that I talked too gave me the new quest!!!  Thanks a lot for the great upload!!!
